Canchánchara.Name: Canchánchara
Canchánchara.Prep: Mix rum and honey together in a glass until honey dissolves. Add remaining greds, fill glass with ice. Mix.

Penicillin.Name: Penicillin
Penicillin.Prep: Shake greds with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Float single malt peaty scotch.

Sazerac.Name: Sazerac
Sazerac.Prep: Chill a glass; empty and rinse with absinthe. Combine greds in a mixing glass, fill with ice, stir. Strain into absinthe glass. Twist a lemon peel over drink for oils, discard peel. Optionally discard ice cube.

Aviation.Name: Aviation
Aviation.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Strain into coupe. Garnish with cherry.

Last Word.Name: Last Word
Last Word.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Double strain into chilled coupe.

Yellow Daisy.Name: Yellow Daisy
Yellow Daisy.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with icx. Stir and strain into chilled coupe.

Rob Roy.Name: Rob Roy
Rob Roy.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with icx. Stir and strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

Rusty Nail.Name: Rusty Nail
Rusty Nail.Prep: Add ice to double old fashioned glass. Add drambiue and scotch. Garnish with citrus twist.

Blood and Sand.Name: Blood and Sand
Blood and Sand.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with orange twist.

Bobby Burns.Name: Bobby Burns
Bobby Burns.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Gibson.Name: Gibson
Gibson.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cocktail onion.

Bijou.Name: Bijou
Bijou.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Tailspin.Name: Tailspin
Tailspin.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Hanky-Panky.Name: Hanky-Panky
Hanky-Panky.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with orange.

Vieux Carré.Name: Vieux Carré
Vieux Carré.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Naked and Famous.Name: Naked and Famous
Naked and Famous.Prep: Shake with ice, strain into chilled coupe.
